name: Slowpstart
description:
Slowpstart - pronounced: Slope-start. You begin on a slope and have to tap space-bar to race to the top. Warning - game may damage your keyboard.

It may be compatible with Android however I haven't yet tested it on mobile.

Game was made for Freesource Jam - I do not own any of the graphics in this game. The art is from two sites; opengameart.org & gameart2d.com (see below).

Credits:

http://www.gameart2d.com/hill-climb-racing---free-car-sprites.html

http://opengameart.org/content/fluffy-clouds - Daniel Gregory Benoy (Submitted by mercury_zero)

Engine: Unity3D 5 (personal edition)

Graphics Editing: Paintbrush

Planning/Scheduling: Notes
